mapper.sql: id as id , name as name , desc as desc , url as url , imageUrl as imageUrl , type as type , bonuses as bonuses , content as content , startTime as startTime , endTime as endTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO power_activity ( name, desc, url, imageUrl, type, bonuses, content, startTime, endTime ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{desc}, #{url}, #{imageUrl}, #{type}, #{bonuses}, #{content}, #{startTime}, #{endTime} )

INSERT INTO power_activity ( name, desc, url, imageUrl, type, bonuses, content, startTime, endTime ) VALUES ( #{map.name}, #{map.desc}, #{map.url}, #{map.imageUrl}, #{map.type}, #{map.bonuses}, #{map.content}, #{map.startTime}, #{map.endTime} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE power_activity
name = #{name},
desc = #{desc},
url = #{url},
imageUrl = #{imageUrl},
type = #{type},
bonuses = #{bonuses},
content = #{content},
startTime = #{startTime},
endTime = #{endTime},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE power_activity
name = #{map.name},
desc = #{map.desc},
url = #{map.url},
imageUrl = #{map.imageUrl},
type = #{map.type},
bonuses = #{map.bonuses},
content = #{map.content},
startTime = #{map.startTime},
endTime = #{map.endTime},
WHERE id = #{map.id}

UPDATE power_activity
name = #{update.name},
desc = #{update.desc},
url = #{update.url},
imageUrl = #{update.imageUrl},
type = #{update.type},
bonuses = #{update.bonuses},
content = #{update.content},
startTime = #{update.startTime},
endTime = #{update.endTime},
${nativeSql}
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, name
, desc
, url
, imageUrl
, type
, bonuses
, content
, startTime
, endTime
FROM power_activity
${nativeSql}
ORDER BY
${sort.field} ${sort.order}
LIMIT 0,1

SELECT
, id

FROM power_activity
${nativeSql}
ORDER BY

, id

${nativeSql}
ORDER BY
